flawed_nl_solution:
The age of Jeremy three years from now will be 40+3 = <<40+3=43>>43 years
Since Sebastian age is four years more than Jeremy's, Sebastian is currently 40+4 = 46 years.
In three years, Sebastian will be 46+3 = <<46+3=49>>49 years old
The total age of Jeremy and Sebastian in three years will be 49+43 = <<49+43=92>>92
If the total age of Jeremy, Sebastian and Sophia in three years is 150, then Sophia's age in three years will be 150-92 = <<150-92=58>>58
#### 58

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 44, not 46. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
